title: Another One Bites The Dust
lyrics:
[intro]
| (Em-Em-Em) | (Em-Em) (G-G) (A) |
| (Em-Em-Em) | (Em-Em) (G-G) (A) |
| (Em-Em-Em) | (Em-Em) (G-G) (A) |
| (Em-Em-Em) | (Em-Em) (G-G) (A) |  (Let´s go)
 
(Em)Steve walks warily (Em)down the street
With his (Em)brim pulled (G)way down (A)low
(Em)Ain´t no sound but the (Em)sound of his feet
Ma(Em)chine guns (G)ready to (A)go
 
[pre-chorus]
Are you (C)ready, hey, are you (G)ready for this
Are you (C)hanging on the edge of your (G)seat
(C)Out of the doorway the (G)bullets rip
(A) To the sound of the (B)beat, yeah ...
 
[chorus]
(Em-Em-Em) A(Em)nother (Em)one (G)bites (G)the (A)dust
(Em-Em-Em) A(Em)nother (Em)one (G)bites (G)the (A)dust
And an(Em)other one gone and a(Em)nother one gone
A(Em)nother one (G)bites the (A)dust
(F#m)Hey, I´m gonna (A)get you too
A(F#m)nother one bites the (B)dust
 
[interlude]
| (Em-Em-Em) | (Em-Em) (G-G) (A) |
| (Em-Em-Em) | (Em-Em) (G-G) (A) |
 
(Em)How do you think I´m going to (Em)get alone
With-(Em)-out you (G)when you are (A)gone
You (Em)took me for every-(Em)-thing that I had
And (Em)kicked me (G)out on my (A)own
 
[pre-chorus]
Are you (C)happy, are you (G)satisfied
How (C)long can you stand the (G)heat
(C)Out of the doorway the (G)bullets rip
(A) To the sound of the (B)beat (Listen)
 
[chorus]
(Em-Em-Em) A(Em)nother (Em)one (G)bites (G)the (A)dust
(Em-Em-Em) A(Em)nother (Em)one (G)bites (G)the (A)dust
And an(Em)other one gone and a(Em)nother one gone
A(Em)nother one (G)bites the (A)dust
(F#m)Hey, I´m gonna (A)get you too
A(F#m)nother one bites the (B-)dust (-G)
 
[interlude, clapping]
(Em-X) (-X)
Another one (X)bites the dust (X)
Another one (X)bites the dust (X) (ooow)
Another one (X)bites the dust (hey, (X)hey)
Another one (X)bites the dust
| (Em-Em-Em) (Hey-ey-ey-ey-ey) | (Em-Em) (G-G) (A) |
| (Em-Em-Em) | (Em-Em) (G-G) (A) |
 
There are (Em)plenty of ways you can (Em)hurt a man
And (Em)bring him (G)to the (A)ground
You can (Em)beat him, you can cheat him, you can (Em)treat him bad
And (Em)leave him (G)when he´s (A)down
 
[pre-chorus]
But I´m (C)ready, yes I´m (G)ready for you
I´m (C)standing on my own two (G)feet
(C)Out of the doorway the (G)bullets rip
Re(A)peating to the sound of the (B)beat
 
[chorus]
(Em-Em-Em) A(Em)nother (Em)one (G)bites (G)the (A)dust
(Em-Em-Em) A(Em)nother (Em)one (G)bites (G)the (A)dust
And an(Em)other one gone and a(Em)nother one gone
A(Em)nother one (G)bites the (A)dust
(F#m)Hey,I´m gonna (A)get you too
A(F#m)nother one bites the (B)dust (G)
 
[outro]
| (Em-Em-Em) | (Em-Em) (G-G) (A) |
| (Em-Em-Em) | (Em-Em) (G-G) (A) |
(Em) [end]
